title: How to Make Salsa Fresca

steps.headline: Chop tomatoes into 1/2-inch pieces and add them to a medium sized bowl.
Remove the seeds and mince the jalapeno peppers.
steps.description: Add the peppers to the chopped tomatoes.

steps.headline: Add the garlic and onion to the chopped tomato mixture.
Stir in the lime juice, salt and pepper.
Add the chopped cilantro and stir gently to just combine.

text: Wash and drain vegetables.  Chop tomatoes into 1/2-inch pieces and add them to a medium sized bowl.  Remove the seeds and mince the jalapeno peppers. Add the peppers to the chopped tomatoes. Peel and mince the garlic.  Peel and chop the onion.  Add the garlic and onion to the chopped tomato mixture.  Stir in the lime juice, salt and pepper.  Add the chopped cilantro and stir gently to just combine.  Finished.
